page.title: 01N.HUISH AMENITIES-ATTITUDES
page.content:
{ {Electricity }was broughtto the Village about 1950. There are no Shops nor a Post Office so residents have to travel for these things.
{Attitudes.} People generally conservative in their ways and keep very much to themselves. Little community activity in village. New centre formed from South Aisle of Church is used for Council Meetings, and has potential for future{Social {Functions.
There are few outlets for {Arts & {Crafts,}but Flower Arranging is popular. Possibly spinning and knitting are practised in the homes in the little spare time available. .
